title: Caesar Clown Will Join the Straw Hats
summary: A theory that Caesar Clown could eventually become a member of the Straw Hat crew, based on foreshadowing and his continued involvement with the crew after Punk Hazard.
fullText: Some fans theorize that Caesar Clown could become the next Straw Hat crew member. Evidence cited includes foreshadowing panels, such as Franky wearing a t-shirt with the letters 'JK' after the Punk Hazard arc, with 'J' potentially referencing Jinbe and 'K' referencing Caesar (from the Japanese spelling 'Kuraun'). Despite his villainous actions, Caesar continues to travel with the Straw Hats in later arcs, leading some to speculate this could be building toward eventual redemption and membership.
author: Various One Piece Fans

source.title: One piece; 1st theory: The next nakama, Caesar Clown

title: Caesar's Devil Fruit is Already Awakened
summary: Theory that Caesar Clown's Gas-Gas Fruit may already be awakened, given the various advanced capabilities he demonstrates.
fullText: Some fans have theorized that Caesar's Devil Fruit abilities are already awakened, pointing to his ability to manipulate and create various types of gases, merge with external gases like Shinokuni, and control gas on a massive scale. The theory suggests that his scientific knowledge combined with awakening allows him to perform feats beyond normal Logia capabilities, such as removing oxygen from large areas and transforming the environment around him into poisonous gas.
author: One Piece Fan Community

title: Law's Mountain Cut Foreshadows Future Awakening
summary: Theory that Law's ability to cut Punk Hazard's mountains foreshadows or demonstrates early signs of his Devil Fruit awakening.
fullText: Fans have debated whether Law's massive Room that cut through mountains at Punk Hazard represents an early form of awakening or foreshadows his eventual Devil Fruit awakening. The feat demonstrates unprecedented range and power for the Ope Ope no Mi, leading some to speculate that Law was pushing the limits of his abilities in ways that would later manifest as full awakening. The theory gained more attention after Law's confirmed awakening was revealed in later arcs.
author: FanVerse Community

source.title: Was the mountain cut law did back in punk hazard awakening?
